title: Software Engineer, Rides
description: Build and scale the core platform for Uber's ridesharing business.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in Go, Java, or Python
responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy highly scalable microservices
Optimize real-time matching and dispatching algorithms

title: Product Manager, Uber Eats
description: Lead the product strategy and roadmap for new features on the Uber Eats platform.
requirements: Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience
5+ years of experience in product management
Experience with marketplace or logistics products
responsibilities: Define product vision and strategy for Uber Eats
Collaborate with engineering, design, and operations teams
Drive product launches and market expansion

title: Data Scientist, Fraud
description: Develop and deploy machine learning models to detect and prevent fraudulent activities on Uber's platforms.
requirements: Master's or PhD in a quantitative field
3+ years of experience in data science or fraud detection
responsibilities: Build and evaluate fraud detection models
Collaborate with engineering and operations teams

title: Operations Manager, Micromobility
description: Manage the operations and logistics for Uber's micromobility (e-scooter, e-bike) services.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, Operations, or related field
4+ years of experience in operations management
responsibilities: Oversee daily operations of micromobility fleet
Manage local teams and vendor relationships

title: Software Engineer, Infrastructure
description: Build and maintain scalable and reliable infrastructure systems that power all of Uber's services.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
4+ years of experience in distributed systems or infrastructure engineering
Proficiency in Java, Go, or C++
responsibilities: Design and implement core infrastructure components
Improve system reliability, performance, and scalability
Provide technical guidance to other engineering teams
